```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(shiny)
library(quantmod)
interval <- 31
closep <- quantmod::Cl(rutils::env_etf$VTI)
plot_theme <- chart_theme()
plot_theme$col$line.col <- c("orange", "blue")
```

## EWMA Prices

This is a simple *R* Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
  sliderInput("lambda", label="lambda:",
    min=0.01, max=0.2, value=0.1, step=0.01)
)  # end inputPanel

renderPlot({
  # calculate EWMA prices
  lambda <- input$lambda
  weightv <- exp(-lambda*1:interval)
  weightv <- weightv/sum(weightv)
  ew_ma <- filter(closep, filter=weightv, sides=1)
  ew_ma[1:(interval-1)] <- ew_ma[interval]
  ew_ma <- xts(cbind(closep, ew_ma), order.by=index(closep))
  colnames(ew_ma) <- c("VTI", "VTI EWMA")
  # plot EWMA prices
  chobj <- chart_Series(ew_ma, theme=plot_theme, name="EWMA prices")
  plot(chobj)
  legend("top", legend=colnames(ew_ma),
         inset=0.1, bg="white", lty=c(1, 1), lwd=c(2, 2),
         col=plot_theme$col$line.col, bty="n")
})  # end renderPlot

```
